::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral looks up suddenly as he hears a voice, nodding. "Go ahead," he 
yells back, and then looks back at Composer.

"Hmm.. The weapon isn't here to be used against you," he 
explains, "This is a dangerous planet, attackers could strike any 
second."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Detecting two new bots in the area, Recklessa turns around, flying 
toward where Astral was, her weapons ready.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> In the distance zooming in to where Astral is meeting new robots
> Motormaster sees the newly downed pod. He looks forward to a chance 
to
> finally meet someone and smash them. Then he looks thoughtful and 
realizes
> he is at a disadvantage. He yells out "asking permission to land"
